summary:
“Ah! A visitor!”
The sylveon(??) stares only a moment longer before hurriedly pointing to the table with one of her ribbons. “Do...
body:
“Ah! A visitor!”

The sylveon(??) stares only a moment longer before hurriedly pointing to the table with one of her ribbons. “Do you want anything? Something to eat, perhaps? I’ll answer any questions about Bright Town you might have- have you heard of me? My name’s Friday.”

((OOC: Friday is now open for asks!))

reblog.comment:

blog.name: weirdandwackypokefusions
blog.title: Well that's strange!
blog.description:
Welcome!  I create, using the all-mighty classic Microsoft XP Paint, my own pokemon fusions. All the sprites come from pokestadium and usually people on deviantart/ the xy/sun&moon sprite project. I don't own any of the sprite used, I just fuse them! 
REQUESTS ARE OPEN! Ask Box: 3/15.
PLEASE FEEL FREE TO DRAW MY FUSIONS!!  I absolutely love it when people draw them! There's no need to ask either! Just make sure you tag me so them I can see it!
I hope you enjoy my fusions!

summary: Aerotortle Aerodactly and Wartortle fusion Water/Flying Type Ability: Shell Armour The Wave Pokemon Aerotortle can create waves...
caption:
Aerotortle

Aerodactly and Wartortle fusion

Water/Flying Type

Ability: Shell Armour

The Wave Pokemon

Aerotortle can create waves with the flap of its wings.  It can’t get into its shell so instead it uses it to block attacks.  Its tail and wings feel as soft as a cloud.

An ask by @poke–glitch.  I suppose I get what you mean!  It does remind me of a Golbat with the large mouth and the small body an the colouring!

reblog.comment:

summary: Why do fairy types get mesmerized by sugar?
question: Why do fairy types get mesmerized by sugar?
answer: Your guess is as good as mine, anon. Sometimes I think they’re just obsessed with how it looks. No matter what they’re doing, they have to stop and stare at it.

reblog.comment: Your guess is as good as mine, anon. Sometimes I think they’re just obsessed with how it looks. No matter what they’re doing, they have to stop and stare at it.
